subject: Delivery problem
description_text:
Hello, I paid for express shipping, but my package took a long time to
arrive, and they also made a mistake with my address. So, is there any
possibility of compensation, as this was very inconvenient, and I paid for
express shipping for nothing? The same goes for the import fees paid to
UPS. Thank you for your response.

conversations.body_text: Hi Lucas FALISSE,    Please provide your UPS invoice, and we will reimburse you for a portion of the cost.
